alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:11AM EST until January 14 at 11:48PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and at Calhoun. For the Green River...including Paradise and Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CST Monday was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
